properties.entry: SELECT ac_name, ac_address, tr_info, act_id, Field FROM (SELECT *,ROWNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM TB_TOUR ORDER BY Field DESC)) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
SELECT ac_name, ac_address, tr_info, act_id, Field FROM TB_TOUR WHERE ac_name = ?
SELECT AC_NAME, AC_ADDRESS FROM TB_TOUR WHERE AC_ADDRESS LIKE '서울%'
